code: var keyset='ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789+/=';export function encodeNoWrap(input){var output='';var i=0;do{var chr1=input.charCodeAt(i++);var chr2=input.charCodeAt(i++);var chr3=input.charCodeAt(i++);var enc1=chr1>>2;var enc2=(chr1&3)<<4|chr2>>4;var enc3=(chr2&15)<<2|chr3>>6;var enc4=chr3&63;if(isNaN(chr2)){enc3=64;enc4=64;}else if(isNaN(chr3)){enc4=64;}output=output+keyset.charAt(enc1)+keyset.charAt(enc2)+keyset.charAt(enc3)+keyset.charAt(enc4);}while(i<input.length);return output;}
